Description.Name: Highway to the Danger Zone!
Description.Details: A knock sounds on your office door and you call out, "Come in..." The door opens and Darius strides in with a datapad, "Commander, the aptitude tests for candidates to attend Wham-Ba-LAM's LAMcademy [[DM.BaseDescriptionDefs[LoreLAM],LAM]] piloting school have come back. There are two pilots who have completed the assessment and should meet the requirements: [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] [[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]] You just need to sign that form on the screen and we can proceed from there."

Description.Name: Select {SCN_MW.Callsign}
Description.Details: [Tuition costs up to ¢500,000]

Description.Name: All Systems Go
Description.Details: You place a tick next to [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]'s name on the datapad and scribble your signature. Handing the pad to Darius as you stand up, "Ok, lets get [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] packed up and on the next jumpship bound for the LAMcademy. Darius jumps up and heads off to the barracks to inform [[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]] they have been accepted into Wham-Ba-LAM's LAMcademy.

Description.Name: None of these pilots are suitable
Description.Details: Non-Participation Option

Description.Name: Abort! Abort!
Description.Details:
You look over the names and records of the two candidates.  You thumb back through their files numerous times, before letting out a long sigh and closed the datapad.

You hand the pad back to Darius, "Thanks Darius, but I do not think any of those two pilots understand our needs here.  See if there are any other suitable candidates.  We do not need to rush into this blindly."

Darius takes the datapad, "As you wish, Commander.  The LAMcademy also states the applicants must wait 90 days before they can reapply should you change your mind later."

<color=#E62E00>The following pilots are not eligible again for 90 days: 
[[SCN_MW,{SCN_MW.Callsign}]]
[[TRT_MW,{TRT_MW.Callsign}]]
</color>
